content: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is located early on after entering the Valley of Ecstasy proper, which requires sliding down a large snowy slope from the Mindfulness Cliff after crossing the Bitter Lake.

Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is located early on after entering the Valley of Ecstasy proper, which requires sliding down a large snowy slope from the Mindfulness Cliff after crossing the Bitter Lake.
